name: The Robot Hunter Alpha
description:
The robots have taken over.  You are the last of the free humans and  you must  destroy the robot Ship so they can not operate. armed with your ship/mech you are The Robot Hunter.

-- CONTROLS--

click to shoot, hold to spam shoot 

click change to go between mech/ship

when shooting drag mouse up and down and back to move.

when mech click to slice 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
